1: ה֣וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Woe</n> שׁוֹדֵ֗ד <sup>7703 </sup> <n>to thee that spoilest</n> וְאַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> שָׁד֔וּד <sup>7703 </sup> <n>and thou [wast] not spoiled</n> וּבוֹגֵ֖ד <sup>898 </sup> <n>and dealest treacherously</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>while did not</n> בָ֣גְדוּ <sup>898 </sup> <n>and they dealt not treacherously</n> ב֑וֹ כַּהֲתִֽמְךָ֤ <sup>8552 </sup> <n>with thee when thou shalt cease</n> שׁוֹדֵד֙ <sup>7703 </sup> <n>to spoil</n> תּוּשַּׁ֔ד <sup>7703 </sup> <n>thou shalt be spoiled</n> כַּנְּלֹתְךָ֥ <sup>5239 </sup> <n>[and] when thou shalt make an end</n> לִבְגֹּ֖ד <sup>898 </sup> <n>to deal treacherously</n> יִבְגְּדוּ־ <sup>898 </sup> <n>they shall deal treacherously</n> בָֽךְ׃ ס
